item.description:
Fosters is guaranteed to please. Please check out the website and join us.
http://fostersrestaur.... I promised the restaurant I would get a final headcount to them the day before our reservation. As always, call me if you are running late, having trouble finding the place or for any other reason. Here is my number:
802
233
9060

You may RSVP for this meet-up beginning at 6:30 PM on Jan 29, 2010

Tom
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the New Haven Dining out group.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Friday at Fosters
